name: head_to_head
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool football_prediction.
Tool description: The Football Prediction API provides predictions for upcoming football matches, average bookie odds, results for past matches and prediction performance statistics for past results.
API description: Fetches and returns head-to-head statistics and previous encounters for the home and away team of an upcoming match.

is_id.description: (use predictions endpoint to get list of IDs)

limit.description: Limits the search to only X previous encounters. The default is 10, with a maximum of 10.
